title: Fix /setup-devrag: settings.json not being copied
description:
When running /setup-devrag, the .claude/settings.json file is not being copied from the template. All other files (hooks scripts) are copied correctly, but settings.json is missing.

Root cause: Command document says to copy the file but doesn't provide explicit instructions.

Fix approach:
1. Add explicit step in /setup-devrag to copy .claude-settings.json.template to .claude/settings.json
2. Verify the file exists after copy
3. Test with fresh project to confirm settings.json is created

title: Fix DevRag config: documents_dir should be project root
description:
The .devrag-config.json template contains invalid fields that don't exist in DevRag, causing it to default to ./documents which doesn't exist.

**Root Cause:**
Template has made-up fields (indexPaths, excludePaths, chunkOverlap, updateInterval, metadata) that DevRag ignores.

**DevRag Actually Supports:**
- documents_dir: Directory containing markdown files
- db_path: Vector database file path
- chunk_size: Document chunk size (not chunkSize)
- search_top_k: Number of results
- compute: {device, fallback_to_cpu}
- model: {name, dimensions}

**Decision:**
Use documents_dir: "." to index entire project root.

**Why:**
1. Want ALL scenes indexed (including drafts/archive) for comprehensive search
2. File paths in results show status: scenes/drafts/... vs scenes/...
3. Performance is fine: 80k novel = ~1000 chunks = 3-5MB DB, <5s GPU index
4. No need for symlinks or complex exclusions

**New Template:**
{
  "documents_dir": ".",
  "db_path": ".devrag/vectors.db",
  "chunk_size": 1000,
  "search_top_k": 10,
  "compute": {"device": "auto", "fallback_to_cpu": true},
  "model": {"name": "multilingual-e5-small", "dimensions": 384}
}

**Implementation:**
1. Replace .devrag-config.json.template with correct schema
2. Update /new-project to use new template
3. Update /setup-devrag to use new template
4. Test indexing and search

description: Transform the writing system into a distributable Claude Code plugin. title: Auto-log session chat transcripts with DevRag indexing
description: Automatically save Claude Code chat transcripts to notes/sessions/YYYY-MM-DD-session-N.md at session end. Include timestamp, word count delta, topics discussed. DevRag auto-indexes for semantic search. Enables natural queries like 'what did we discuss about magic system last week?' without manual logging overhead. Integrate with existing /session end hook.

title: Create /concept command for pre-project brainstorming
description: Create a new /concept command that enables pre-project brainstorming workflow. Command should: 1) Run outside of a project directory, 2) Capture story concept (high-level pitch like 'Count of Monte Cristo in space'), 3) Interactive brainstorming for characters, setting, genre, tone, 4) Save session to concept-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS.md in current directory, 5) At end, offer to create project from concept, 6) If yes, collect project name and run /new-project workflow, 7) Move concept-*.md to new-project/brainstorms/initial-concept.md, 8) Pre-populate project.json with metadata from brainstorm session. This matches natural creative workflow: concept → brainstorm → structure.
